page.title: 10Religion-Bolton by Bowland
page.content: In our village there is one{Anglican {church,}it is named after{St Peter and {St Paul.}Mr Vaughan is the rector there and is also the rector of Grindleton church.There is an 11.00am service and a 6.00pm Evensong.About 25 people come each week.Every month there is a children's service, afterwards children aged 11 to 16 years go to a Bible study. At{Holden}there is an Independant Chapel,it is interdenominational.Every week about 30 people come.There is also a Sunday School where around 10 children come each week.
